name: Car Driving School Modern City
description:
Car Driving School Modern City is realistic driving school simulation & car parking game with highest graphics ever! If you think that you are the best driver and vale, do not stop and enjoy the game!
This Game will be a great practice for you and helpful to park your car in real life.You can set camera angle by swiping on the screen up, down left and right. zoom in and out by double touch "
You will also learn how to actually park your car while enjoying the game and master yourself by practicing. You will be the king of parking. Now most addictive driving & parking adventure is here to test you as a car parking driver. Master the game play of unique car parking game play styles. Precision in handling steering wheel of a racing car is attribute that is associated with new car parking driver. Parking lots, city are the playground for new car parking driver, explore more for the car parking jobs. Hours of entertainment with parking cars, driving cars etc.

OTHER FEATURES:
Park easily while using the parking sensor!
FILL YOUR DREAM GARAGE WITH MAGNIFICENT CARS
LEARN TRAFFIC SIGNS AND RULES WHILE HAVING FUN
Multistory car parking garage
Different camera angles
Interior camera view
Different control methods ( Steering wheel, keycaps and tilt)
Park like a real driver with steering wheel
In that game we provide automobiles like in your dream garage
Valet parking is not like real parking try it with steering wheel
Do hard parking like using classic car, use steering wheel and do hard parking
Like Garage owner you will hard park as a driver spot
Valet parking will be your simulation via steering wheel
Hard parking game with street car
Cockpit go game
Multi languages
Real cockpit and cars
Feel like valet parking
